reviewText:
Justine Bateman and Peter Outerbridge elevate a mediocre script and predictable story. Palpable chemistry is evident here as we see two people find their way back to each other. If the other Harlequin movies had been this good, they might still be making them.
Nice work all round.

I dare you not to get misty eyed when Lisa Temple (Bateman's character)remembers...
